Description:
Field Sales - AgadirWould you like to be part of the most international company in the world? A company operating in more than 220 countries worldwide and has been pioneering cross-border express shipping since 1969.  Would you like to be part of a business that connects people across the globe and want to make a difference? Then waste no time and join our amazing team at Deutsche Post DHL (DPDHL). DHL Global Forwarding, Freight (DGFF) is the Group's air, ocean, and road freight specialist. We offer standardized transport as well as highly specialized end-to-end solutions to customers in a wide range of industries globally.DHL Global Forwarding has an opening for Field Sales in  Agadir. In this specific position you will have the primary duty to achieve personal target according to budget and to achieve high KPI score necessary for payout. Under supervision support field sales plans and processes to achieve revenue growth, enhance customer retention and acquisition, and increase lead conversion for a defined geographic region, product line or market segment in line with business strategy, financial objectives, Group guidelines and policiesJoin us in connecting people and improving lives!In this Field Sales - Agadir positionYou will have to develop and maintain strong existing customer relations and loyalty through ensuring customers satisfaction.
You will interface with customers to respond to questions, requirements and expectations.
You will have to identify/Work/Close Key Target customers together with local TLM & Vertical Managers.
You will have to coordinate with internal marketing colleagues to bring opportunities to deal closure.
You will have to maintain close cooperation with Operations & Products.
You will have to make sure he/she is actively selling all services under the umbrella of the organization
You will have to develop relationship with external Stakeholders (Industrial Development Agencies) and other regulatory agencies that stimulate economic development
You will have to monitor the competition, obtain competitive information and share with other DHL stakeholders.
You will have to build rapport and credibility with management, sales and operations departments.
You will have to make sure he/she are very knowledgeable with product details.
You will have to support Sales Support through aggressive “Sales Lead” Programs.
You will have to develop key tools needed to support customer capture of new opportunities.
You will have to identify/develop Market new products & services.
You will have to provide administration support .Now, here’s what we need from youMinimum 2 years’ experience in Sales 
Sales ability and demonstrable full knowledge of the sales process.
Confidence in presenting technical and marketing data to clients and colleagues.
Excellent organizational and time management skills.
Knowledge of business, services, practices and company policies and procedures.
Confident negotiator and ability to close the deal.
General understanding and use of word processing, spreadsheets/databases, presentation software and internet.We offer:Opportunities in a global company where you can contribute your ideas and skills to move towards our shared goals.
Possible further career development
Competitive salaryWhy join DHL Global Forwarding?We are part of Deutsche Post DHL, the world’s leading logistics provider with operations in over 220 countries. Visit our career site on the web at https://www.logistics.dhl/us-en/home/careers.htmlOur TOP EMPLOYER prestigious certification attests to our best-in-class efforts to attract and retain talent by fostering a positive work environment and encouraging personal and professional development among employees. The development of talented women in our organization will be a focus for us and an important part of our DGF Strategy 2025. We aspire to become the undisputed leader in our industry, when people think of forwarding; we want them to think DGF because we have:The largest global network with more than 30,000 passionate employees
The most efficient processes and fastest response times
The best solutions and best customer serviceOur Vision: The Logistics Company for the World.Our Mission: Excellence. Simply Delivered.
Our Purpose: Connecting People, improving lives.
Our Values: Respect & Results
Our Goals: Employer, Provider, and Investment of Choice, Living ResponsibilityDHL Global Forwarding is an equal opportunity employer.
